Blinky

Blinky, also known by the nickname Shadow, is the leader of the Ghosts and the arch-enemy of Pac-Man. He is also portrayed as the most aggressive ghost who always chases Pac-Man, and is hard to shake once he starts.

Pinky

Pinky, also known by the nickname Speedy, is one of the four main ghosts in the Pac-Man series. She is represented as the only female ghost and likes to be pretty. She attempts to ambush Pac-Man by moving parallel to him.

Inky

Inky, also known by the nickname Bashful, is one of the four main ghosts in the Pac-Man series. He is often depicted as a goofy and slow-headed ghost, not pursuing Pac-Man unless other ghosts are near.

Clyde

Clyde, also known by the nickname Pokey, is one of the four main ghosts in the Pac-Man series. While the other three ghosts are off chasing Pac-Man, Clyde will be off doing his own thing. He is typically portrayed as the least intelligent and most submissive ghost.
